source.query:
SELECT 
  league_id,
  season,
  stage,
  DATE_FORMAT(`date`, '%Y%m%d') AS datekey,
  match_id,
  home_team_id ,
  away_team_id,
  home_team_goal,
  away_team_goal,
  home_player_1 ,
  home_player_2,
  home_player_3 ,
  home_player_4 ,
  home_player_5 ,
  home_player_6 ,
  home_player_7 ,
  home_player_8 ,
  home_player_9 ,
  home_player_10 ,
  home_player_11 ,
  away_player_1 ,
  away_player_2 ,
  away_player_3 ,
  away_player_4 ,
  away_player_5 ,
  away_player_6 ,
  away_player_7 ,
  away_player_8 ,
  away_player_9 ,
  away_player_10 ,
  away_player_11 ,
  CAST(B365H as decimal(18,6)) B365H,
  CAST(B365D as decimal(18,6)) B365D,
  CAST(B365A as decimal(18,6)) B365A,
  CAST(BWH as decimal(18,6)) BWH,
  CAST(BWD as decimal(18,6)) BWD,
  CAST(BWA as decimal(18,6)) BWA,
  CAST(IWH as decimal(18,6)) IWH,
  CAST(IWD as decimal(18,6)) IWD,
  CAST(IWA as decimal(18,6)) IWA,
  CAST(LBH as decimal(18,6)) LBH,
  CAST(LBD as decimal(18,6)) LBD,
 CAST(LBA as decimal(18,6)) LBA,
  CAST(PSH as decimal(18,6)) PSH,
  CAST(PSD as decimal(18,6)) PSD,
  CAST(PSA as decimal(18,6)) PSA,
  CAST(WHH as decimal(18,6)) WHH,
  CAST(WHD as decimal(18,6)) WHD,
  CAST(WHA as decimal(18,6)) WHA,
  CAST(SJH as decimal(18,6)) SJH,
  CAST(SJD as decimal(18,6)) SJD,
  CAST(SJA as decimal(18,6)) SJA,
  CAST(VCH as decimal(18,6)) VCH,
  CAST(VCD as decimal(18,6)) VCD,
  CAST(VCA as decimal(18,6)) VCA,
  CAST(GBH as decimal(18,6)) GBH,
  CAST(GBD as decimal(18,6)) GBD,
  CAST(GBA as decimal(18,6)) GBA,
  CAST(BSH as decimal(18,6)) BSH,
  CAST(BSD as decimal(18,6)) BSD,
  CAST(BSA as decimal(18,6)) BSA,
  current_timestamp() as update_time 
 FROM socceranalysis.match;

SELECT match_api_id as match_id
, case when goals='None' then NULL else cast(goals as decimal(18,6)) end goals
,case when shoton='None' then NULL else cast(shoton as decimal(18,6)) end shoton
,case when penalties='None' then NULL else cast(penalties as decimal(18,6)) end penalties
,subtype
,current_timestamp() as update_time  FROM socceranalysis.match_attributes;

SELECT player_id,
  DATE_FORMAT(`date`, '%Y%m%d') AS datekey,
  cast(overall_rating  as decimal(18,6)) overall_rating,
  cast(potential  as decimal(18,6)) potential,
  preferred_foot ,
  attacking_work_rate ,
  defensive_work_rate ,
  cast(crossing  as decimal(18,6)) crossing,
  cast(finishing  as decimal(18,6)) finishing,
  cast(heading_accuracy  as decimal(18,6)) heading_accuracy,
  cast(short_passing  as decimal(18,6)) short_passing,
  cast(volleys as decimal(18,6)) volleys,
  cast(dribbling as decimal(18,6)) dribbling,
  cast(curve as decimal(18,6)) curve,
  cast(free_kick_accuracy as decimal(18,6)) free_kick_accuracy,
  cast(long_passing as decimal(18,6)) long_passing,
  cast(ball_control as decimal(18,6)) ball_control,
  cast(acceleration as decimal(18,6)) acceleration,
  cast(sprint_speed as decimal(18,6)) sprint_speed,
  cast(agility as decimal(18,6)) agility,
  cast(reactions as decimal(18,6)) reactions,
  cast(balance as decimal(18,6)) balance,
  cast(shot_power  as decimal(18,6)) shot_power,
  cast(jumping  as decimal(18,6)) jumping ,
  cast(stamina  as decimal(18,6)) stamina ,
  cast(strength  as decimal(18,6)) strength,
  cast(long_shots  as decimal(18,6)) long_shots,
  cast(aggression  as decimal(18,6)) aggression,
  cast(interceptions  as decimal(18,6)) interceptions,
  cast(positioning  as decimal(18,6)) positioning,
  cast(vision  as decimal(18,6)) vision,
  cast(penalties  as decimal(18,6)) penalties,
  cast(marking  as decimal(18,6)) marking,
  cast(standing_tackle  as decimal(18,6)) standing_tackle,
  cast(sliding_tackle  as decimal(18,6)) sliding_tackle,
  cast(gk_diving  as decimal(18,6)) gk_diving,
  cast(gk_handling  as decimal(18,6)) gk_handling,
  cast(gk_kicking  as decimal(18,6)) gk_kicking,
  cast(gk_positioning  as decimal(18,6)) gk_positioning,
  cast(gk_reflexes  as decimal(18,6)) gk_reflexes,
  current_timestamp() as update_time 
 FROM socceranalysis.player_attributes;

SELECT  team_id,
  DATE_FORMAT(`date`, '%Y%m%d') AS datekey,
  CAST(buildUpPlaySpeed  as decimal(18,6)) buildUpPlaySpeed,
  buildUpPlaySpeedClass ,
  CAST(buildUpPlayDribbling  as decimal(18,6)) buildUpPlayDribbling,
  buildUpPlayDribblingClass ,
  CAST(buildUpPlayPassing  as decimal(18,6)) buildUpPlayPassing,
  buildUpPlayPassingClass ,
  buildUpPlayPositioningClass ,
  CAST(chanceCreationPassing  as decimal(18,6)) chanceCreationPassing,
  chanceCreationPassingClass ,
  CAST(chanceCreationCrossing  as decimal(18,6)) chanceCreationCrossing,
  chanceCreationCrossingClass ,
  CAST(chanceCreationShooting  as decimal(18,6)) chanceCreationShooting,
  chanceCreationShootingClass ,
  chanceCreationPositioningClass ,
  CAST(defencePressure  as decimal(18,6)) defencePressure,
  defencePressureClass ,
  CAST(defenceAggression  as decimal(18,6)) defenceAggression,
  defenceAggressionClass ,
  CAST(defenceTeamWidth  as decimal(18,6)) defenceTeamWidth,
  defenceTeamWidthClass ,
  defenceDefenderLineClass,
  current_timestamp() as update_time  
FROM socceranalysis.team_attributes;
